properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 23 DEC BY
   M/V ARTEMIS ANGLER TOWING SIX 160 METER LONG
   CABLES IN AREA BETWEEN
   24-51.00S 24-24.00S AND 042-24.10W 042-01.13W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3938/17.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 24 DEC 17.
